verbose_text: A large number of studies discovered that P-S6K stimulated mRNA translation by phosphorylating the subunit of ribosomal S6, while p-4E-BP1 in conjunction with other translational control proteins stimulated mRNA translation by releasing eIF4E to be linked with the 5 ' end of mRNA [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: S6, while p-4E-BP1 in conjunction with other translational control proteins stimulated mRNA translation by releasing eIF4E
